name: Granny's Computer
description:
This is a game created for the "Glitch" themed Godot Wild Jam # 10.  Use the mouse to debug a janky old computer.  Don't let the error windows exit the screen!

This is my first jam game and my first Godot project, so it's a little rough.  I think it still technically qualifies as a game.

The windows in the game were created using Atom Smasher's error window generator found here:  http://atom.smasher.org/error/

Everything else was hastily slapped together by me during the jam.
